node.title: 'There will be life after Covid' - PM reveals decision for NZ's border reopening
node.description: Jacinda Ardern has outlined the details about when New Zealand's borders will reopen.
node.content: ["Prime Minister Jacinda Ardern has outlined the details about when New Zealand's borders will reopen.", "Watch it here:", "See how today's developments unfolded with RNZ's blog:", "A staged timeline was outlined late last year, but was quickly delayed because of the risks posed by Omicron. Cabinet ministers reviewed the dates this week."]
